summary: A collection of pytest fixtures, dummy functions, and test cases that validate Kedro's IPython extension, covering node description formatting, extension loading, lazy pipeline/object loading, the %load_node magic command, and project path resolution.
business_intent: Guarantee that Kedro integrates smoothly with IPython notebooks, allowing developers to interactively load and inspect pipeline nodes, manage project configurations, and rely on consistent behavior of the IPython magic utilities.
